translation.key: InfectionClass, by necropotame (version {str:VersionCode})
translation.value: InfectionClass, by necropotame (version {str:VersionCode})

translation.key: Based on the concept of Infection mod by Gravity
translation.value: Based on the concept of Infection mod by Gravity

translation.key: Main contributors: {str:ListOfContributors}
translation.value: Main contributors: {str:ListOfContributors}

translation.key: Thanks to {str:ListOfContributors}
translation.value: Thanks to {str:ListOfContributors}

translation.key: No player was found with this name
translation.value: No player was found with this name

translation.key: Rules of the game
translation.value: Rules of the game

translation.key: InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.
translation.value: InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.

translation.key: All players start as human.
translation.value: All players start as human.

translation.key: 10 seconds later, two players become infected.
translation.value: 10 seconds later, two players become infected.

translation.key: The goal for humans is to survive until the army clean the map.
translation.value: The goal for humans is to survive until the army clean the map.

translation.key: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.
translation.value: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.

translation.key: How to translate the mod
translation.value: How to translate the mod

translation.key: Create an account on Transifex and join a translation team:
translation.value: Create an account on Transifex and join a translation team:

translation.key: For any question about the translation process, please contact us on IRC ({str:IRCAddress})
translation.value: For any question about the translation process, please contact us on IRC ({str:IRCAddress})

translation.key: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.
translation.value: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.

translation.key: When an infected touch the wall, he dies.
translation.value: When an infected touch the wall, he dies.

translation.key: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan}, and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan}, and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.

translation.key: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.
translation.value: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.

translation.key: Each bomb can explode {int:NumBombs} times.
translation.one: Each bomb can explode one time.

translation.key: Use the hammer to place the bomb and explode it multiple times.
translation.value: Use the hammer to place the bomb and explode it multiple times.

translation.key: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.

translation.key: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.

translation.key: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.
translation.one: Mines are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.other: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.

translation.key: He has also grenades that teleport him.
translation.value: He has also grenades that teleport him.

translation.key: The biologist has a shotgun with bouncing bullets and can create a spring laser trap by shooting with his rifle.
translation.value: The biologist has a shotgun with bouncing bullets and can create a spring laser trap by shooting with his rifle.

translation.key: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.
translation.value: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.

translation.key: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.
translation.value: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.

translation.key: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.
translation.value: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.

translation.key: The Hero must find a flag hidden in the map.
translation.value: The Hero must find a flag hidden in the map.

translation.key: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.
translation.value: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.

translation.key: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.
translation.value: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.

translation.key: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected during three seconds.
translation.value: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected during three seconds.

translation.key: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.
translation.one: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump one time before touching the ground.
translation.other: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.

translation.key: The Mercenary fly in air using his machine gun.
translation.value: The Mercenary fly in air using his machine gun.

translation.key: He can coil and remotely ignite explosives of various effects with his hammer.
translation.value: He can coil and remotely ignite explosives of various effects with his hammer.

translation.key: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points.
translation.one: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal one damage point.
translation.other: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points.

translation.key: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.
translation.value: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.

translation.key: He can jump two times in air.
translation.value: He can jump two times in air.

translation.key: He has also a powerful rifle that deals 20 damage points in locked position, and 9-10 otherwise.
translation.value: He has also a powerful rifle that deals 20 damage points in locked position, and 9-10 otherwise.

translation.key: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: He can also inflict 4 damage points per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: He can also inflict 4 damage points per second by hooking humans.

translation.key: The Boomer explodes when he attack.
translation.value: The Boomer explodes when he attack.

translation.key: All humans affected by the explosion become infected.
translation.value: All humans affected by the explosion become infected.

translation.key: He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.

translation.key: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes a damage or if he use his hammer.
translation.value: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes a damage or if he use his hammer.

translation.key: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: When selecting any gun, his hook enter in web mode.
translation.value: When selecting any gun, his hook enter in web mode.

translation.key: Any human that touch a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.
translation.value: Any human that touch a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.

translation.key: The hook of the spider (in both mode) deal 1 damage point per second and can grab a human during 2 seconds.
translation.value: The hook of the spider (in both mode) deal 1 damage point per second and can grab a human during 2 seconds.

translation.key: The Ghoul can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Ghoul can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: He can devore all that has died close to him, which makes him stronger, faster and more resistant.
translation.value: He can devore all that has died close to him, which makes him stronger, faster and more resistant.

translation.key: Thereupon he digests his fodder bit by bit going back to his normal state, and besides, death bereaves him of his nourishment.
translation.value: Thereupon he digests his fodder bit by bit going back to his normal state, and besides, death bereaves him of his nourishment.

translation.key: The Slug can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Slug can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: He can make the ground and walls toxic by spreading slime with his hammer.
translation.value: He can make the ground and walls toxic by spreading slime with his hammer.

translation.key: Touching the slime inflicts three damage points in three seconds on a human.
translation.value: Touching the slime inflicts three damage points in three seconds on a human.

translation.key: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: Instead of dying, he freezes during 10 seconds.
translation.value: Instead of dying, he freezes during 10 seconds.

translation.key: If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappear.
translation.value: If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappear.

translation.key: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.

translation.key: When an infected dies, he may re-spawn near her.
translation.value: When an infected dies, he may re-spawn near her.

translation.key: If the Witch dies, she disappear and is replaced by an another class of infected.
translation.value: If the Witch dies, she disappear and is replaced by an another class of infected.

translation.key: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.

translation.key: Targeted chat messages
translation.value: Targeted chat messages

translation.key: Use "/msg <PlayerName> <My Message>" to send a private message to this player.
translation.value: Use "/msg <PlayerName> <My Message>" to send a private message to this player.

translation.key: Use "/msg !<ClassName> <My Message>" to send a private message to all player with a specific class.
translation.value: Use "/msg !<ClassName> <My Message>" to send a private message to all player with a specific class.

translation.key: Example: "/msg !medic I'm wounded!"
translation.value: Example: "/msg !medic I'm wounded!"

translation.key: Use "/msg !near" to send a private message to all players near you.
translation.value: Use "/msg !near" to send a private message to all players near you.

translation.value: Choose a help page with /help <page>
